snippet: James privately embarked on board of a frigate, and was safelylanded at Ambleteuse, in France. He was receivedby Louis XIV with the utmost generosity and hospitality, and lived for many years at St Germains,under his protection and at his expense, exceptingonly during a short campaign (to be afterwards noticed) in Ireland.
